title: What is the Rome tennis schedule?
description: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia begins on Wednesday, when home favourites Lorenzo Sonego and Luciano Darderi will be featured on Campo Centrale. View Wednesday's order of play below. [ATP APP] ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, 07 MAY 2025 Campo Centrale - start 11:00 WTA - Sara Errani (ITA) vs Naomi Osaka (JPN) Not Before 13:00 ATP - Tallon Griekspoor (NED) vs Miomir Kecmanovic (SRB) ATP - Lorenzo Sonego (ITA) vs [Q] Roman Andres Burruchaga (ARG) Not Before 19:00 WTA - Antonia Ruzic (CRO) vs Tyra Caterina Grant (ITA) Not Before 20:30 ATP - Yunchaokete Bu (CHN) vs Luciano Darderi (ITA) Grand Stand Arena - start 11:00 ATP - Jiri Lehecka (CZE) vs Alexandre Muller (FRA) Not Before 13:00 WTA - Elisabetta Cocciaretto (ITA) vs Elina Avanesyan (ARM) WTA - Lucrezia Stefanini (ITA) vs Veronika Kudermetova ATP - [WC] Francesco Passaro (ITA) vs [Q] Chun-Hsin Tseng (TPE) WTA - Alexandra Eala (PHI) vs Marta Kostyuk (UKR) SuperTennis Arena - start 11:00 ATP - Jordan Thompson (AUS) vs Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA) WTA - Arianna Zucchini (ITA) vs Victoria Mboko (CAN) WTA - Bianca Andreescu (CAN) vs Federica Urgesi (ITA) ATP - Christopher O'Connell (AUS) vs [LL] Cameron Norrie (GBR) WTA - Maya Joint (AUS) vs Emma Raducanu (GBR) Pietrangeli - start 11:00 WTA - Victoria Azarenka vs Camila Osorio (COL) ATP - Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG) vs [LL] Pablo Carreno Busta (ESP) ATP - Yoshihito Nishioka (JPN) vs [Q] Dusan Lajovic (SRB) WTA - Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova vs Katie Boulter (GBR) ATP - Laslo Djere (SRB) vs Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG) Court 14 - start 11:00 ATP - Daniel Altmaier (GER) vs Francisco Comesana (ARG) WTA - Varvara Gracheva (FRA) vs Ajla Tomljanovic (AUS) WTA - Ashlyn Krueger (USA) vs Anna Bondar (HUN) WTA - Emiliana Arango (COL) vs Viktoriya Tomova (BUL) ATP - [Q] Vilius Gaubas (LTU) vs Damir Dzumhur (BIH) Court 1 - start 11:00 ATP - Rinky Hijikata (AUS) vs Corentin Moutet (FRA) WTA - Elena-Gabriela Ruse (ROU) vs Polina Kudermetova WTA - Maria Sakkari (GRE) vs Belinda Bencic (SUI) ATP - Hamad Medjedovic (SRB) vs [Q] Otto Virtanen (FIN) WTA - Dayana Yastremska (UKR) vs Anastasia Potapova Court 2 - start 11:00 WTA - Marketa Vondrousova (CZE) vs Xinyu Wang (CHN) ATP - [Q] Carlos Taberner (ESP) vs Aleksandar Kovacevic (USA) WTA - Hailey Baptiste (USA) vs Anna Blinkova WTA - Katerina Siniakova (CZE) vs Olga Danilovic (SRB) WTA - Katie Volynets (USA) vs Arantxa Rus (NED) Court 15 - start 11:00 WTA - Caroline Dolehide (USA) vs Sorana Cirstea (ROU) ATP - [Q] Vit Kopriva (CZE) vs Quentin Halys (FRA) WTA - Moyuka Uchijima (JPN) vs Eva Lys (GER) [NEWSLETTER FORM]
excerpt: The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia begins on Wednesday, when home favourites Lorenzo Sonego and Luciano Darderi will be featured on Campo Centrale. Pablo Carreno Busta, Yoshihito Nishoka, and Cameron Norrie are among those in action.

Rome

Carreno Busta, Nishioka to play on Pietrangeli

May 06, 2025

Getty Images

The Internazionali BNL d'Italia runs from 7-18 May. By ATP Staff

The 2025 Internazionali BNL d'Italia begins on Wednesday, when home favourites Lorenzo Sonego and Luciano Darderi will be featured on Campo Centrale.

View Wednesday's order of play below.

ORDER OF PLAY - WEDNESDAY, 07 MAY 2025
Campo Centrale - start 11:00
WTA - Sara Errani (ITA) vs Naomi Osaka (JPN)

Not Before 20:30
ATP - Yunchaokete Bu (CHN) vs Luciano Darderi (ITA)

Grand Stand Arena - start 11:00
ATP - Jiri Lehecka (CZE) vs Alexandre Muller (FRA)

Not Before 13:00
WTA - Elisabetta Cocciaretto (ITA) vs Elina Avanesyan (ARM)
WTA - Lucrezia Stefanini (ITA) vs Veronika Kudermetova
ATP - [WC] Francesco Passaro (ITA) vs [Q] Chun-Hsin Tseng (TPE)
WTA - Alexandra Eala (PHI) vs Marta Kostyuk (UKR)

SuperTennis Arena - start 11:00
ATP - Jordan Thompson (AUS) vs Giovanni Mpetshi Perricard (FRA)
WTA - Arianna Zucchini (ITA) vs Victoria Mboko (CAN)
WTA - Bianca Andreescu (CAN) vs Federica Urgesi (ITA)
ATP - Christopher O'Connell (AUS) vs [LL] Cameron Norrie (GBR)
WTA - Maya Joint (AUS) vs Emma Raducanu (GBR)

Pietrangeli - start 11:00
WTA - Victoria Azarenka vs Camila Osorio (COL)
ATP - Camilo Ugo Carabelli (ARG) vs [LL] Pablo Carreno Busta (ESP)
ATP - Yoshihito Nishioka (JPN) vs [Q] Dusan Lajovic (SRB)
WTA - Anastasia Pavlyuchenkova vs Katie Boulter (GBR)
ATP - Laslo Djere (SRB) vs Tomas Martin Etcheverry (ARG)

Court 14 - start 11:00
ATP - Daniel Altmaier (GER) vs Francisco Comesana (ARG)
WTA - Varvara Gracheva (FRA) vs Ajla Tomljanovic (AUS)
WTA - Ashlyn Krueger (USA) vs Anna Bondar (HUN)
WTA - Emiliana Arango (COL) vs Viktoriya Tomova (BUL)
ATP - [Q] Vilius Gaubas (LTU) vs Damir Dzumhur (BIH)

Court 1 - start 11:00
ATP - Rinky Hijikata (AUS) vs Corentin Moutet (FRA)
WTA - Elena-Gabriela Ruse (ROU) vs Polina Kudermetova
WTA - Maria Sakkari (GRE) vs Belinda Bencic (SUI)
ATP - Hamad Medjedovic (SRB) vs [Q] Otto Virtanen (FIN)
WTA - Dayana Yastremska (UKR) vs Anastasia Potapova

Court 2 - start 11:00
WTA - Marketa Vondrousova (CZE) vs Xinyu Wang (CHN)
ATP - [Q] Carlos Taberner (ESP) vs Aleksandar Kovacevic (USA)
WTA - Hailey Baptiste (USA) vs Anna Blinkova
WTA - Katerina Siniakova (CZE) vs Olga Danilovic (SRB)
WTA - Katie Volynets (USA) vs Arantxa Rus (NED)

Court 15 - start 11:00
WTA - Caroline Dolehide (USA) vs Sorana Cirstea (ROU)
ATP - [Q] Vit Kopriva (CZE) vs Quentin Halys (FRA)
WTA - Moyuka Uchijima (JPN) vs Eva Lys (GER)
